bibl.title: Ptolemaic Baths in Front of Karnak Temples. Recent Discoveries (Season 2009-2010).
bibl.note: Part I. The heating system (S. el-M. & B.R.). - Part 2. The floor decoration and painted plaster of the baths (M.B. & A.-M. G.-S.). - Avec résumés en anglais et en arabe.
bibl.seg: Mansour Boraik, Salah el-Masekh, Anne-Marie Guimier-Sorbets & Bérangère Redon, Ptolemaic Baths in Front of Karnak Temples. Recent Discoveries (Season 2009-2010).
